title: Contact Request Details
description: Visitor contact details such as chat start and end, as well as click to email, text, and call counts.

xdm:chatDeclined.title: Chat Declined
xdm:chatDeclined.description: Captured when an offered chat is declined by a visitor.

xdm:chatEnd.title: Chat End
xdm:chatEnd.description: Captured when a chat is ended with a visitor.

xdm:chatOffered.title: Chat Offered
xdm:chatOffered.description: Captures the number of times a chat session has been offered to a visitor.

xdm:chatSessionID.title: Chat Session ID
xdm:chatSessionID.description: Captures the chat session identifier, if available.

xdm:chatStart.title: Chat Start
xdm:chatStart.description: Captured when a chat is initiated with a visitor.

xdm:clickToCall.title: Click to Call
xdm:clickToCall.description: Visitor initiates a call to the client from a telephone number link on the site/app.

xdm:clickToDirectMessage.title: Click to Direct Message
xdm:clickToDirectMessage.description: Visitor initiates a direct message or feedback to the client from a direct message form on the site/app.

xdm:clickToEmail.title: Click to Email
xdm:clickToEmail.description: Visitor initiates an email to the client from an email link on the site/app.

xdm:clickToText.title: Click to Text
xdm:clickToText.description: Visitor initiates a SMS/text message to the client from a SMS/text link on the site/app.

xdm:subject.title: Subject
xdm:subject.description: Subject of contact requested by the visitor, such as in-store purchase support, online order support, credit customer service, etc.

xdm:callBackNumber.title: Call Back Contact Information
xdm:callBackNumber.description: The contact phone number the visitor uses for responses to contact requests.

xdm:replyToEmailAddress.title: Reply to Email Address
xdm:replyToEmailAddress.description: The email address the visitor uses for responses to contact requests.
